flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $20 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=20>>20
Todd made $150 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=150>>150
Todd has $170 before he pays his brother back because 20 + 150 = <<20+150=170>>170
After Todd pays his brother back he has $60 because 170 - 110 = <<170-110=60>>60
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
